title: Non-verbal hypnosis, Magnetism and Fascination - the power of the gaze Exercises / Dr. Paret
description:
The students of Dr. Marco Paret are doing exercises of non-verbal hypnosis, Magnetism and Fascination - the power of the gaze. These unique techniques work for deep transformation & healing. Quantum Alchemy and non-verbal hypnosis are unlocking the doors to the unknown and unleashing the power within you! Dr. Paret is in the field of non-verbal hypnosis for more than 25 years and now he is sharing his knowledge to his students, all over the world. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
 https://www.youtube.com/user/neurolinguistic  

Join our Italian channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/pnlcoaching  

For any further information, please contact us at:
